urn:metodoIntegracaoGenerico.str_xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ZMI> <DATABASES> <DATABASE> <COMMANDS> <SELECT> <MERCADORIAS> <MERCADORIA> <FIELD NAME='COD_LOJA'/> <FIELD NAME='COD_MERCADORIA'/> <FIELD NAME='DESCRICAO'/> <FIELD NAME='COD_SIT_TRIB_PIS'/> <FIELD NAME='ALIQUOTA_PIS'/> <FIELD NAME='PERC_SUBST_PIS'/> <FIELD NAME='PERC_REDUZ_B_CALCULO_PIS'/> <FIELD NAME='COD_SIT_TRIB_COFINS'/> <FIELD NAME='ALIQUOTA_COFINS'/> <FIELD NAME='PERC_SUBST_COFINS'/> <FIELD NAME='PERC_REDUZ_B_CALCULO_COFINS'/> <FIELD NAME='CUSTO_CONTABIL'/> <FIELD NAME='FLGINATIVO'/> <FILTER FIELD='FLGINATIVO' TYPE='EQUAL'> <VALUE>1</VALUE> </FILTER> </MERCADORIA> </MERCADORIAS> </SELECT> </COMMANDS> </DATABASE> </DATABASES> </ZMI>
